ai-documentation/API_CONTRACTS.title: API Contracts Documentation
ai-documentation/API_CONTRACTS.description: This document describes the API endpoints used by the frontend and E2E tests. It serves as a contract reference to ensure tests match actual API behavior.

ai-documentation/BACKEND_API.title: Backend API Reference
ai-documentation/BACKEND_API.description: .NET 9.0 Web API built with Clean Architecture and Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles.

ai-documentation/BLENDER_ADDON.title: Blender Addon
ai-documentation/BLENDER_ADDON.description: The Modelibr Blender addon enables direct integration with the server for browsing, importing, and uploading 3D models.

ai-documentation/FRONTEND.title: Frontend Development Guide
ai-documentation/FRONTEND.description: React 18+ application with TypeScript, Three.js for 3D rendering, and PrimeReact UI components.

ai-documentation/MCP_TESTING_REPORT.title: Services Testing Report for Copilot Agent

ai-documentation/TESTING.title: Testing Documentation
ai-documentation/TESTING.description: Testing philosophy: Tests should be readable documentation, not just coverage metrics.

ai-documentation/TEXTURE_CHANNEL_MAPPING.title: Texture Type Channel Mapping - Design Specification

ai-documentation/WORKER.title: Thumbnail Worker Service
ai-documentation/WORKER.description: Node.js microservice for generating 3D model thumbnails and animated previews. Operates independently from the .NET Web API, communicating via REST API and SignalR.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: History of completed features and improvements.

features/blender-addon.title: Blender Addon
features/blender-addon.description: The Modelibr Blender addon enables direct integration with your model library, allowing you to browse, import, and upload models without leaving Blender.

features/models.title: Model Management
features/models.description: Modelibr helps you organize and manage your 3D model library with automatic thumbnails, version control, and easy navigation.

features/recycled-files.title: Recycled Files
features/recycled-files.description: The Recycle Bin provides a safety net for deleted items, allowing you to recover accidentally deleted models, versions, texture sets, and sprites.

features/texture-sets.title: Texture Sets
features/texture-sets.description: Texture Sets allow you to manage PBR (Physically Based Rendering) textures and apply them to your 3D models.

features/user-interface.title: User Interface
features/user-interface.description: Modelibr uses a flexible panel system that lets you organize your workspace and share layouts with URLs.

intro.title: Getting Started
intro.description: Modelibr is a self-hosted 3D model library that helps you organize, preview, and manage your 3D assets.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Tasks ordered by priority. AI agents should work from top to bottom.
